title: Projects
clubpetro: Clubpetro is a fuel station network management system that includes customer management, data analysis, and more!
fincheck: Fincheck, a finance control system, was developed during JSStack, covering both frontend and backend with NodeJS learnings.
clapme: Over The Top platforms refer to streaming services. CLAPME OTTS provides customers with a unique visual identity, along with client-proposed features such as event listings, countdowns, customer registration, lead capture, and more!
skolen: Skolen is a school management system that enables complete school administration, offering data and engagement metrics for students, teachers, classes, and more!
